summary: This document is an email chain from August 11, 2019, discussing a Reuters/Breitbart report that prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death. The participants are coordinating a call to discuss the report and its implications, with one participant mentioning a trip with the 'AG' (likely Attorney General).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news report being discussed; his death in prison is the central topic.

events.title: News Report on Prison Guard Checks
events.description: A report is published (on Breitbart, citing Reuters) stating that prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Coordination Call Scheduled
events.description: Participants in the email chain schedule a call for noon to discuss the news report about Epstein's death and the prison guard checks.

keyFacts: An email chain from August 11, 2019, shows individuals reacting to and coordinating a discussion about a news report on Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The report, published on August 10, 2019, claimed prison guards at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) skipped mandatory checks before Epstein died.
One email participant mentions leaving 'for my trip with the AG,' indicating a connection to the Attorney General's office.
The tone of the emails suggests concern and urgency regarding the public release of information about the circumstances of Epstein's death.
